lead_paragraph: GARCIA--Joan, on January 14, 2016. Reposing at Schuyler Hill Funeral Home, 3535 E. Tremont Avenue, Bronx, NY 10465 on Thursday, 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Religious service on Thursday at 7:30pm. 1/3
